website_summaries.verdict: This double-walled acrylic tub is lightweight, affordable, and easy to install.
pros: Double-walled construction with high-gloss acrylic reinforced by fiberglass
Brushed nickel overflow and pop-up drain
cons: Some reports of this model having a low spot, so it does not drain completely

customer_reviews.title: I love it but please know the overflow and the drain ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but please know the overflow and the drain are not brushed nickle as in the description. It is shiny chrome. I returned mine only to receive another one exactly the same. Picture is deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: AAngel

customer_reviews.title: The bathtub looks perfect in our restroom
customer_reviews.text: The bathtub looks perfect in our restroom. We had a small problem with a pipe contacted the manufacturer and they responded quickly and addressed our problem smoothly. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: jacky zhang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: To be clear, I haven’t used this tub yet. We are still under renovation. However, so far I am very satisfied with this product and customer service. My first tub came cracked and they were happy to replace it within a short time period. It’s exactly what I was looking for in a freestanding tub!
customer_reviews.author: SPW

customer_reviews.title: Nice tub.
customer_reviews.text: Bathroom looks amazing with this tub. Easy to install as there is a lot of room under it for the electrical plugins and the plumbing is flexible tubing, so it fits easily. One thing I didn’t like, the fittings are all cheap plastic and all leaked. I had to silicone each fitting and rubber washer to keep it from leaking at the drain fittings. For the price, simple quality washers and metal end fittings would have been expected. The wife loves the air and jets! Nice tub. It’s $250 cheaper on the manufacturer website as of 9/1/18. FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tub for very reasonable pricing. I did have my sub switch out the drain hose for better quality and fittings.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Frenzel

customer_reviews.title: Unwrapped bathtub to discover multiple cracks
customer_reviews.text: We will never know whether or not this was a good bathtub because we unwrapped it only to discover multiple cracks on the interior and one large crack along the perimeter of the exterior. Unfortunately, we are well past the 30-day Amazon return window because the plumbing in our 100+ year old house took much longer to redo, along with enlarging and installing new windows. Supposedly, the fibergalss laminate tub body is covered by a 5 year warranty, so we are hopeful that Woodbridge will make things right. I will update this review if and when they do.
customer_reviews.author: Dalimama

customer_reviews.title: Great look and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Tub was installed by a professional who was extremely impressed with the quality of the tub and accessories. Installation went smoothly. Faucets and drain are very well-made. We live the look and feel of the tub. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob J

customer_reviews.title: Elegant modern tub
customer_reviews.text: The first tub arrived and had a crack but Amazon handled it superbly, arranged to have it picked up when the replacement was delivered. Delivery was professional and polite. The tub itself is surprisingly attractive and looks very modern and sleek. I've had many compliments, even though I opted to just get a cheap tub (for a stand-alone, which are very expensive). Been using it for six months, I recommend it. It can be a tad slippery until you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Elegant style
customer_reviews.text: Arrive quickly, shipping was pleasant and the tub is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and buy a more durable hose!!! terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy a more durable hose. As we were about to close everything up, we ran the water and it leaked at the ends and the plastic is so cheap we were afraid if we sealed the tub the plastic could eventually with time would break anyway.
customer_reviews.author: LETITIA SINGLETON

customer_reviews.title: well made bathtub, glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Glad I made this purchase! The bathtub was just as well constructed as the description stated, and I love its high gloss acrylic finish! The installation was easy and didn't take our handyman very long. We've used it a few times and are very happy; it's easy to clean and a great size. We actually bought a bigger rectangular tub at first, but ended up exchanging it for this one since the rectangular tub was a little too big for us. The entire exchange process was simple and quick, and service was great. We've also purchased other Woodbridge brand products and are extremely satisfied with all of them. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J L.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant inexpensive bathtub
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bathtub for our master bathroom remodel and so far we love it. The first one we ordered had minor damage on the side and amazon returned it and sent me a new one with no question. This bathtub adds an elegance factor to our master bath and is very comfortable. So far we love it but will update the review in a few months if anything changes!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice product needs heavy duty drain parts below the tub
customer_reviews.text: Tub is nice, I added sound/insulation material inside the shell and that made a world of difference. This is the third one I've installed so I knew about this ahead of time. Besides that the plumbing pieces that attach to the drainpipe under the tub could be a little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Rockrunner

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this tub! It is beautiful, was easy to install for our plumber and the price was considerably less than any comparable tub we could find in our local stores. The delivery process went very smoothly, and the tub arrived with no damage. I was worried about ordering a tub unseen, but my worry was unnecessary. It is very comfortable to sit in and is big enough that both myself and my husband can fit in it at the same time. Customer service was quick to answer any questions or concerns we had. Love it and would definitely recommend this tub!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very practical to install compared to other freestanding
customer_reviews.text: Even though is super light, it is still sturdy enough. It is super easy to install (drain doesn't got to be located perfectly). Drain whose flexibility allows installation to be simple. Push drain hardware and overflow look very nice. Size very convenient it even fit two people.
customer_reviews.author: pcaj

customer_reviews.title: Great Soaker Tub for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tub! At first I didn’t think it would be deep enough, but wow it is deep enough for a nice soak! Maintains temp for a long time. Very easy to clean! Looks great in my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tub was exactly what I was looking for. The plumber that installed did not use the flexible tubing provided. So far we have had no issues with leaks as other reviews speak of this. I purchased the recommended faucet but returned it, our plumber refused to install it stating it was extremely poor quality. I purchased a Delta faucet instead. I get tons of compliments from guests!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Overflow had to be attached by silicone
customer_reviews.text: The tub is perfect - exactly what we wanted! There was a problem with overflow cover - it had to be glued to the tub by silicone as the screwes did not hold it - not bad after all.
customer_reviews.author: Biscy

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't has any non skid material on the bottom of the bathtub, last night I almost fell when I stepped in. It is too slippery, you definitely need to improve your product before someone gets injured.
customer_reviews.author: PEDRO VENTURA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, smooth and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This tub is amazing. It is so comfortable to lie in to soak or to sit up and relax. Smooth acrylic with drain that is simply a pop-up. Beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it a 5 because it’s really beautiful! Looks great in my new remodeled bathroom! We got the 59 1/2 size. Perfect fit. It is a bit light weight But I can deal with it. I will see what can be done so it’s more sturdy. The first tub I received had a dent in it. I contacted Amazon as always great service! They had a new one sent out to me right away.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Q

customer_reviews.title: I passed this one for next project
customer_reviews.text: It’s not like the photo at all and so hard to connect
customer_reviews.author: zhang lu

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This was sent in a timely manner, arrived in pristine condition and was easy to install. It is very small though. Its not very high and i do wish i had bought the larger one or raised it off the floor. It is a very small bath.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service and product
customer_reviews.text: So far I have had great customer service. I have yet to installed it so I am not able to say now about how it works but I do appreciate everything so far. The shipment was perfect. Guys dropped off on time and helped me make sure nothing was damaged. Customer service called to make sure it was delivered just right. I hope to write more details once it will be installed. I also bought WoodBridge T-0008 Luxury Bidet Toilet from the company and it also was delivered as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Uday

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful tub. The placement of the drain is in the middle so it’s very easy to push it and it drain all the water while trying to lay down and relax. Also, not insulated. I do not take long baths, but I frequently have to add hot water to rehear the bath water. This is my first freestanding bath tub, so this could be a “problem” with all.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenises

customer_reviews.title: Great soaking tub!
customer_reviews.text: Tub is very spacious for soaking. It is good size for 2 adults, one over 6 feet. The tub is sleek and modern. Easy to install even for DIYs as our plumber messed it up and we had to pull it out and reinstall. We’ve had no issues with water cooling down. Woodbridge has been very helpful. We love the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Deciding on a bathtub was not easy. My husband convinced me to purchase the Woodbridge 67 Freestanding tub and I am very satisfied. It’s luxurious, spacious, and good quality. Very easy to install. Used it and liked it!
customer_reviews.author: Pascale

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and fine for larger folks...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby is 6'2" 250 lbs and can use this tub with no problems at all. It is very deep and great for soaking. Plumber marked the location of the drain before the tile guys came in. He was able to come back and attach the drain with no issues after tile installation. The tub is light, easy to get into position. The faucet is also very nice. I love the spray handle attachment, makes it easy to rinse off after a bath, or to rinse your hair. Tub is easy to clean and looks great. I have received tons of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Crack in edge
customer_reviews.text: The tub is very comfortable for my 5’2” frame. It also cleans up well. The tub sat in my master bedroom boxed up for 5 weeks before my installer finally got to it. Unfortunately, I then found 2 small cracks at the top edge at one end of the tub. It still holds water but I have to look at 2 cracks in my brand new tub that I paid good money for. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: m & m

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tub
customer_reviews.text: I love the tub, and can't wait to get in fully in my bathroom. The tub arrived, but we just realized that it is missing the rubber gaskets for drain to complete the installation. I'm hoping someone from the company can help with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F

customer_reviews.title: Plumbing flaws but comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: We really like taking a bath in this tub when it’s working. Our issue is that the tub comes disconnected all the time. Whether it’s the hose for the air pump, the drain or the legs come off while repairing it, there always seems to be something. I wish more than anything that the plumbing design was as good as the comfort level of the tub. As such. Buyer beware. You will spend more time fixing than you will soaking.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Terhorst

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, very long at 67” (I am 5’10”). Seems easy to clean. The only issue so far has been the drain - it is in the center of the tub, so sometimes I sit on it and open it accidentally. Tub will be used occasionally so I don’t mind too much.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grytdal

customer_reviews.title: A joy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Heavy. Exactly as advertised. Packaged well. Good install instructions. I lined the inside (from the bottom) with insulation to keep my hot water hot for longer. Lovely. I think I’ll add a chandelier with battery powered, remote operated candles.
customer_reviews.author: CanyonCat

customer_reviews.title: You will need to buy a compression connector to connect this.  Great otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. The only thing is it really should come with a compression connector which can be used with the fitting that it comes with. The parts included are not sufficient (in my plumbers opinion) to insure no leaking (or blow out). The fitting I had to buy was $1.50? Like really? Coulda been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tub for a great price! it's very large, looks amazing in our newly renovated bathroom. would purchase same tub again for another bathroom, and definitely recommend the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty drain
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review because of the wonderful customer service I received. he manufacturer reached out to me immediately after I wrote my review and did everything possible to rectify my drain situation. I will add to this review when I receive the replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: There was a minor crack on the side of the tub, wasn't noticeable enough, so I decide not to return it. 2 weeks of use, the crack becomes noticeable and the tub starts leaking now. Sign, such a headache .
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this tub! I ordered it on line, and relied on the reviews, some great, others not. I had a plumber install it, so it was very easy for me :) He did not use the part included with the tub, but the drain was directly below the center of the tub, so it wasn't needed. The faucet and wand are great! I have had nothing but compliments on this beautiful tub!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Waltenspiel

customer_reviews.title: Broken tub
customer_reviews.text: I should have followed the advise of the other buyer. Ours is cracked too. We took months to install due to Covid and now that we unwrapped the tub, it is all cracked. I am really upset that a large purchase like this do not have support from anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Acser8

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tub
customer_reviews.text: Like the linear lines for a full hot relaxing bath.
customer_reviews.author: KAYE BURKETT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Great bathtub; looks awesome. Lightweight too. Not big enough for a very tall person but just right for the average person. Looks great in our bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!!!! Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service from this company-and I love my bathtub. I bought 2 of them and they look and work great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't change a thing!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and shape! Delivery service was off the charts, on time, great updates, and incredibly friendly! Buy this with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap. Looks fancy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a high quality tub but feels hallow of cheap. I’m actually really worried about kids or husband breaking it/cracking it but so far so good. Very comfortable and I love having it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek modern looking tub
customer_reviews.text: Love the sleek modern look and style. Easy to install and the comfort can't be beat. We flip a lot of houses and these are our go to tubs. Looking forward to ordering more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good value, comfortable, but check the box when it arrives
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. It’s comfortable to sit in and we were told it was easy to install. Be sure to open the box before you have a plumber install. We had this shipped to a vacation home and were sent the wrong tub. We caught the problem too late, but would have preferred the one we picked out.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look for the low price.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for the price. Looks perfect in our remodeled master bath. I think it looks high end for the price. Easy delivery and has held up perfect in the 3 months since install. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dorrien

customer_reviews.title: Plumber can’t install
customer_reviews.text: Plumber can’t figure out how to install...he is a master plumber... purchase something else
customer_reviews.author: Tysen C.

customer_reviews.title: The floor model faucet is wonderful. The tub fills quickly and the sprayer is ...
customer_reviews.text: The floor model faucet is wonderful. The tub fills quickly and the sprayer is nice for cleaning the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene F Walstrum

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged, super thin and didn’t feel sturdy. I would not recommend this tub.
customer_reviews.author: "jessesgirl04"

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome. Performs Awesome. Easy as to install. Great size. Easy to maneuver . Nothing not to love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expactions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and just beautiful product once in place. Completely changed the dynamic of the room.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON C.

customer_reviews.title: Great tub
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, perfect size for a smaller space. Only drawback is that included faucet fills tub pretty slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Packer

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Love the tub! Easy to clean and nice to soak in.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Zelk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful!!! Cannot wait to soak!!! Really even better than described!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dement

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: We just installed it and it looks great. Can't wait to get in this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tub
customer_reviews.text: Look lovely. Shipping was fast. Light is great. Etc great
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

product_meta.title: Woodbridge 67" Acrylic Freestanding Bathtub Contemporary Soaking Tub with Brushed Nickel Overflow and Drain, B-0002 / BTA1504
product_meta.description: Color:B-0002 without FaucetWoodbridge 67" Acrylic Freestanding Bathtub Contemporary Soaking Tub with Brushed Nickel Overflow and Drain, B-0002 / BTA1504
feature_bullets: ✅ [ DIMENSIONS AND SPECIFICATIONS]: Exterior Dimension: 67" Long x 31 3/4" Wide x 23" Deep – Effective Tub Capacity: 60 Gallons

✅ [PREMIUM QUALITY CONSTRUCTION ]: Woodbridge bathtub is made out of 100% high gloss white LUCITE acrylic and reinforced with ASHLAND resin & fiberglass . All of these are top quality material which are rarely used by others due to a relatively high cost.

✅ [DESIGN INSPIRATION]: Woodbridge bathtub is luxury, comfort and chic style. Its size is ample yet economical allowing it to fit a variety of spaces. Gently sloping lines follow the natural curves of your body providing exceptional comfort.
✅ [ENDURACLEAN]: Easy clean, easy maintenance, stain-resistant, scratch resistant surface that maintains its high gloss. Can be use for a long time. And keep bright and clean as new.

✅ [ DURABLE]: Acrylic and reinforced with fiberglass for long lasting durability. Bottom with stainless steel bracket makes the bearing capacity is up to 1000 LBS , Double Walled reinforce design bringing maximum insulation and keeping water at its desired temperature longer and suitable for 1 Or 2 persons bathing.

✅ [ TOP QUALITY DRAIN & PIPE ] Woodbridge bathtub includes anti-leak design drain & pipe system which is tough & durable , Anti -odor , easy to install. Total pipe length 37". With Woodbridge bathtub, NO cheap drain /hose, NO leak trouble. surface and structural. 1 year limited on the plumbing parts

✅ [PACKAGE INCLUDED]: Assembled solid brass brushed nickel drain, stainless steel brushed nickel overflow, user & instruction manual. Besides, extremely solid package - very firm carton box is used to transport bathtubs, making sure a safe delivery.

✅ [CERTIFICATION & ]: US & Canada UPC & CSA certified products. 5 years limited on the bathtub surface and structural. 1 year limited on the plumbing parts , Woodbridge US based product support team is happy to assist with any sales or product-oriented queries.

specifications.Material: Fiberglass, Stainless Steel, Resin, Brass, Acrylic
specifications.Warranty Description: 5 years limited Warranty on the bathtub surface and structural. 1 year limited warranty on the plumbing parts
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
